shift to intelligently bring data back out of S3 so if there's any data loss within the cluster due to a failure of

called streaming restore and what that does it enables you um how red shift behaves in this situation it first
restores the specific data requested by any queries that are being uh issued
against the the cluster at that time and it will fault in that data to make sure that those queries are satisfied so
